com.nordicid.nurapi

Class NurCustomHopTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nordicid.nurapi.NurCustomHopTable

  • public class NurCustomHopTable
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds information about custom hop table.

        public NurCustomHopTable(int[] freqs,
                         int nChan,
                         int chTime,
                         int pauseTime,
                         int lf,
                         int Tari)
        Parameters:
        freqs - Frequencies.
        nChan - Number of channels.
        chTime - Channel time.
        pauseTime - Idle time between channel change if any.
        lf - Maximum link frequency.
        Tari - Tari definition; 1 = 12.5 and 2 = 25us.
